query:
SELECT gl.id, gl.gestorId, gl.lojaId, l.nome as loja_nome, g.id as gestor_table_id, u.name as user_name
FROM gestor_lojas gl
LEFT JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE l.nome IN ('Sm castanheira do ribatejo', 'Sm pesados porto', 'Viseu sm')
ORDER BY l.nome
command:

LEFT JOIN lojas l ON gl.lojaId = l.id
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON gl.gestorId = g.id
LEFT JOIN users u ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE l.nome IN ('Sm castanheira do ribatejo', 'Sm pesados porto', 'Viseu sm')
